body:
I did a git pull, here is the error message with gcc5.5:

nvcc fatal   : Could not open output file '/tmp/tmpxft_00047b8a_00000000'
nvcc fatal   : Could not open output file '/tmp/tmpxft_00047b89_00000000'
nvcc fatal   : Could not open output file '/tmp/tmpxft_00047b8b_00000000'
CMake Error at gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o.Release.cmake:215 (message):
  Error generating
  /home/frank/pytorch/build/third_party/gloo/gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir//./gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o

CMake Error at gloo_cuda_generated_nccl.cu.o.Release.cmake:215 (message):
  Error generating
  /home/frank/pytorch/build/third_party/gloo/gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/nccl/./gloo_cuda_generated_nccl.cu.o



CMake Error at gloo_cuda_generated_cuda.cu.o.Release.cmake:215 (message):
  Error generating
  /home/frank/pytorch/build/third_party/gloo/gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir//./gloo_cuda_generated_cuda.cu.o


cd /home/frank/pytorch/build/caffe2 && /home/frank/miniconda2/bin/cmake -E copy /home/frank/pytorch/caffe2/python/mkl/mkl_sbn_speed_test.py /home/frank/pytorch/build/caffe2/python/mkl
make[2]: *** [third_party/gloo/gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

make[2]: *** [third_party/gloo/gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/gloo_cuda_generated_cuda.cu.o] Error 1
